name: Memories Of Loneliness
description:
You are a mother who is looking for her daughter, but strange things begin to happen, go through this place to find her and find out what happened ...
A little story in the first person, where you will have to find your daughter observing everything, and go through different levels.
Exploring the details, moving forward and opening doors.
The goal is to try to find her.

Caution!
No save system, because it is a very short game
